title: Spinning Out
description: Ginny and Barb might be mother and daughter, but as far as Ginny is concerned they are very different.At thirty-three, Ginny needs a break ... from work, men and her mother. A three-month stay in Australia with her best friend is a perfect escape. But meeting Lachlan and having to choose between career and love, New York or Melbourne wasn't what she expected. Her mother and best friend have their opinions about what she should do, but Ginny is determined to make her own way ...
author: Christine Darcas
